page.title: 13Blackfen School
page.content: This Junior school opened in 1933 and celebrated their 50th Anniversary by a party and concert,and the 320 pupils were given commemorative mugs.Pupils are aged 41/2 to 11 and they wear a green and white or grey and white uniform .There are four Houses named Montrose,Danson,Bexley and Sherwood.The school has two netball,two rounders,one cricket,and softball teams. The day starts with register and assembly,then maths and English is done in the morning.Some pupils have a packed lunch_some have a school dinner in the canteen.In the afternoon pupils have craft,topic work or games. School ends at 3.30pm.There are clubs like badminton,athletics,gym. Sometimes older pupils go on trips abroad or to Wales.
